text: God, having raised up His Servant Jesus,Perhaps 4% of the Greek manuscripts, of inferior quality, omit “Jesus” (as in NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.). As is often the case, the eclectic text weakens the statement. sent Him to you first,Wait a minute! When did this ‘sending’ take place? It was after the resurrection, but Jesus never showed Himself to the people at large during the forty days. I take it that God is doing the ‘sending’ through the Apostles, who started their ministry in Jerusalem (‘to you first’). to bless you by turning each of you away from your iniquities.”To be turned away from one's iniquities is a major blessing, because of the consequences of those iniquities, both now and later.
